meta.purpose: Convert product & interaction definition into step-by-step executable tasks for OpenClaw Agent

phase_0_preflight.description: Read PROJECT_CONTEXT and DEVELOPMENT_GOALS in full before any implementation. Do not implement features not explicitly listed.
acceptance_criteria: Agent confirms typing is the only progress trigger

phase_1_app_entry_experience.description: Implement app launch behavior that directly enters a typing-ready state instead of a traditional home page.
acceptance_criteria: On first render, input is focused
User can start typing immediately without clicking

phase_1_app_entry_experience.description: Render secondary feature entries below the typing area in a weak visual hierarchy.
constraints: Must not compete with typing input visually

phase_1_app_entry_experience.description: When the user presses the first valid key, animate secondary feature entries out and transition seamlessly into full typing mode.

phase_2_typing_page_state_machine.description: On entering Idle state, auto-play word audio once and cache it.
Track user input, correctness, pauses, and error counts in real time.
Show phonetic hints only when trigger conditions are met.
After word completion, show correctness feedback and expandable learning area.
constraints: Next word must be accessible immediately

phase_3_batch_and_progress.description: Trigger progress animation only when a batch is completed.

phase_4_vocab_heatmap_animation.description: Map each vocabulary word to a single square unit.

steps: Animate color changes based on correctness
Camera zooms out to reveal large-scale vocabulary map
Display optional text: 'You have mastered XX words'
constraints: Animation must not block future learning

phase_5_non_functional_requirements.description: Use TDesign components and default blue tokens.
Implement dark mode and internationalization support.
Integrate Youdao Dictionary public API for English and Japanese pronunciation.
